author: Special Correspondent
text:
An AIADMK councillor Veeranan of ward 88 was accused of violating the model code of conduct.

According to city police, the councillor had hoisted his party flag near a place of worship in Jaihindpuram.

Complaint

Following a complaint from the Jaihindpuram Sub-Inspector of Police, a case was registered against Veeranan.
title: AIADMK councillor booked
